content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, the graph of which of the following functions has a vertical asymptote at <math alttext="x equals fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cot x"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mi>x</mi></math>

<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cot open parentheses x minus pi over 2 close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cot open parentheses x minus pi over 4 close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cot open parentheses x plus pi over 4 close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals cot open parentheses x plus pi over 4 close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

topic.text: 3.11: The Secant, Cosecant, and Cotangent Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
